headline: Lightship's electric RVs are bringing campgrounds into the future
summary: Welcome to the campgrounds of tomorrow! Lightship RV is bringing outdoorsmen and road warriors the next generation of electric-powered recreational vehicles. Lightship Co-Founder and CPO (chief product officer) Ben Parker sits down with Asking for a Trend's Josh Lipton for a conversation on their vehicles' EV batteries and solar-powered modules, pricing, and its other features. Parker previously worked as a senior mechanical design engineer for Tesla's (TSLA) battery design team. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.
